text: VIS Interactive was a video game company by WB Interactive. It was formed in 1996 by Chris van der Kuyl and Peter Baillie. The company also provided interactive content for Interactive Digital Television ("iTV") and broadband. VIS entertainment plc consisted of VIS Games and associated companies Axis Animation and VIS iTV. The company had over 100 employees. On April 7, 2005, VIS filed for bankruptcy. Later in the month, all development work was cancelled and assets were sold to other developing companies. == References == Category:Video game companies of the United Kingdom Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:1996 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2005 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: VIS Interactive
